about.title: About me
about.primary: I'm a recent graduate with experience in both frontend and backend development. I have a strong passion for problem-solving and user-centric development, and I'm eager to grow and learn.
about.secondary: I've previously also earned a teaching degree, a bachelor's degree in English, and a bachelor's degree in religion. These diverse academic pursuits have given me a well-rounded skill set and a unique perspective in the world of web development.

projects.title: Manage Packages - Gameplan
projects.description: This project was executed during my internship at Learn2Esport. My assignment was to update and improve the pages involving package management on their platform Gameplan. I am unable to show the source code since it belongs to the company.

projects.title: D'oro - Italian Restaurant
projects.description: This project is a webpage for the fictional italian restaurant D'oro and consists of three parts. The first part is a public webpage where customers can see the menu, book a table, leave a review and contact the restaurant. The second part is a admin interface where staff can log in and alter the menu. And the last part is a webservice to store the data.
projects.technologies: REST API, Gulp, SASS, Node.js, Typescript, PHP

projects.title: Gläntan - Bed & Breakfast
projects.description: This project is a website for the fictional company Glämtan Bed & Breakfast. The website uses WordPress as a CMS and a new theme has been created.

projects.title: Mitt Bibliotek - Book App
projects.description: This project is a library application for storing information about books. Books can be added and removed from the API easily through the application interface.

projects.title: Humble Boutique
projects.description: This project is an online store for the fictional company Humble Boutique that sells second hand items. The biggest focus in this project was image processing.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: This is where you can describe about your contact. The more you describe about your contact, the more chances you have!
